name: Melon Chop 2014
description:
Melon Chop 2014 is a game where you must chop and sell melons in order to be rich, and purchase the Melon Skyscraper!

Melon Chop 2014 was made by Integershift Game Development. You can follow them at:

https://twitter.com/integershift         

https://twitter.com/TheAgentVoxel

https://twitter.com/MadmicadXP
